      • generateOperationNameMethodTitle

        protected final void generateOperationNameMethodTitle(List<String> existingOperationNames,
                                    com.thoughtworks.qdox.model.JavaMethod javaMethod,
                                    OperationType operation,
                                    String suggestedName)
        Generate the operation name, method and title attributes. This method will check for duplicates (overloaded methods) and generate a different method name for these overloaded methods, also setting the method attribute in the process (otherwise not needed). If the method seems to be overloaded, then the operationName tag in the javadoc is looked up. If it does not exist, a long name will be generated using the concatenated method name and parameter names and their types.
        Parameters:
        operationList - the operation list to check for overloaded methods
        javaMethod - the java method
        operation - the operation

      • generateTitle

        protected final String generateTitle(String base)
        Generate an appropriate title for an element holding "title". The title of an element is shown in the workbench as label for the operation, configuration, input, output and fault elements. This method will make a sentence of a camel cased string, transform it to lower case and finally capitalize the first letter again.
        Parameters:
        base - the camel cased string
        Returns:
        the sentence

      • getFullyQualifiedJavaType

        protected final String getFullyQualifiedJavaType(com.thoughtworks.qdox.model.Type type)
        Get the fully qualified name from a Type object. If the type is a generic, java.lang.Object is returned.
        Parameters:
        type - the type
        Returns:
        the fully qualified name

      • getCommentMapForTag

        protected final Map<String,String> getCommentMapForTag(com.thoughtworks.qdox.model.JavaMethod javaMethod,
                                     String tagName)
        Get the comments on a doc tag in a map (key is the first value in the doc tag, the rest is the value).
        Parameters:
        javaMethod - the java method in which to look for the tag
        tagName - the name of the tag
        Returns:
        a map of comments for a certain tag name
